name: Cause Blankets
description:
*SPECIAL PROMOTION*
April is Autism Awareness month! For this special occasion, I have a special promotion. Order an Autism Awareness blanket and get free shipping. Email me before you order to get the free shipping code! This will be available through the month of April.

I wanted to use this shop to give back in some way. So this idea was born. These blankets will signify some specific cause, such as puzzle pieces for Autism awareness. I will periodically have new causes represented here. All profits from these blankets will be donated to an organization that benefits the cause.

Blankets are available in  the following sizes and styles, and are made as ordered.
Basic baby
Banded baby
Adult throw

Currently available for Autism awareness only. Custom orders are welcome though, so if you have a specific cause you would like a blanket to support, please email me. I will do my best to help out whichever cause you wish to support.

The blanket profits will go to the following organizations:
Autism - Autism Society http://www.autism-society.org/

Wash with cold water and dry on low to prolong the life of your blanket.

Please keep in mind that these items are made by hand. Due to this, the final product may vary slightly from the photos.

If you are located in the Corpus Christi Bay area, please contact us prior to ordering. We can hand deliver your product and exclude shipping costs for you.
For shipping outside of the United States, please email me before you order, so I can find the best shipping cost for you.

Handmade with love.
Proudly crafted in the U.S.A.

name: Banded Blankie
description:
Perfect for keeping baby nice and warm inside the home or out on the town.

Our Baby Blankies feature a 1-1/2" band throughout the entire edge of all sides of the blanket.  The blankets measure approximately 36" x 36" and feature a cotton outer layer with a soft minky or fleece inner layer.
 
Camo - Camo pattern cotton outer/brown fleece inner

Cross & Fish - Parchment Cross & Fish pattern cotton outer/yellow minky inner

Looking for a certain color or design? Email me! Custom orders are always welcome.

Wash with cold water and dry on low to prolong the life of your blankie

If you are located in the Corpus Christi Bay area, please contact us prior to ordering. We can hand deliver your product and exclude shipping costs for you.
For shipping outside of the United States, please email me before you order, so I can find the best shipping cost for you.

Handmade with love.
Proudly crafted in the U.S.A.

name: V-Neck T-shirt Onesie
description:
Love comfy v-neck t-shirts? Now your little one can have one too. Made from adult v-neck t-shirts, these onesies are a great piece to add style to your little one's wardrobe.

Pre-made available in green or grey, size 0-3 month. Red, white, and black/light pink stripes can be made in size of your choice. If you would like a specific color not listed, email me! We will discuss colors. If I can get a t-shirt in the right color, you can order a custom!

The original pattern used to make these was based on the measurements of the basic Gerber onesies.

Onesies are made as ordered. Once you place an order, I will verify your size, and get to work. Items generally take 3 or less days to be made and shipped. You will receive shipping information once your items have been shipped.

Follow t-shirt care instructions.

If you are located in the Corpus Christi Bay area, please contact us prior to ordering. We can hand deliver your product and exclude shipping costs for you.
For shipping outside of the United States, please email me before you order, so I can find the best shipping cost for you.

Handmade with love.
Proudly crafted in the U.S.A.

name: Wiggle Onesie
description:
Show off your little wiggler with this onesie. The design is hand-stenciled in the colors of your choice on a onesie in the size you choose. Simply order your desired size, and I will confirm colors through email.

Please keep in mind that these items are made by hand, as ordered. Due to this, the pattern may vary slightly from the photos.

Because this item is made to order, the product will not be shipped immediately. This item generally take 2 to 3 days to complete and ship. I will begin working on this product as soon as you confirm color and bubble size by responding to my email. You will also be notified as soon as the product is shipped.

I suggest washing these onesies inside-out in cold or warm water and tumble drying on low to help preserve the painted design longer.

If you are located in the Corpus Christi Bay area, please contact us prior to ordering. We can hand deliver your product and exclude shipping costs for you.
For shipping outside of the United States, please email me before you order, so I can find the best shipping cost for you.

Handmade with love.
Proudly crafted in the U.S.A.

name: Scrappy Tutu
description:
Want a tutu for your little girl, but don't want all the tulle and ruffle of a classical one? Then this scrappy tutu is for you!
Made out of strips of fabric, tulle, lace, and/or ribbon, this tutu will be a great addition to your little ballerina's wardrobe.

Some pre-made options are listed. You can also order a custom tutu. Simply email me with all the details on color, size, preferred pattern etc. You let me know what you want, and I'll do my best to find fabric that fits your wants and needs. If I can find what you want, you can come back here and order the custom tutu!

Please keep in mind that these items are made by hand. Due to this, the final product may vary slightly from the photos.

If you are located in the Corpus Christi Bay area, please contact us prior to ordering. We can hand deliver your product and exclude shipping costs for you.
For shipping outside of the United States, please email me before you order, so I can find the best shipping cost for you.

Handmade with love.
Proudly crafted in the U.S.A.
